title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, March 7, 2020
description: It's the anniversary of the first March from Selma to Montgomery (1965). Footage of policemen attacking these marchers helped shift public opinion on the civil rights movement.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the anniversary of the first March from Selma to Montgomery (1965). Footage of policemen attacking these marchers helped shift public opinion on the civil rights movement.
